definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: put an end to, exterminate, poet. and (in

definitions.title: Qal, Pi.
definitions.body: ) hyperb. (prop. compress, NH id., press together; Ar. s.amata is be silent, II, IV.make speechless, silence; Syr. s.mat be silent (in Lexx));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[חַיׇּ֑י]] …[[חָֽמְתוּ ]] La 3:63 = they have put an end to my life (Bu conj. Pi.).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be ended, annihilated; Pf. 1 s. [[מִפְּנֵיאחשֶׁךְ]] Job 23:17 I am [not] annihilated because of  (the) darkness; 3 pl. [[נִחְמָָתוּ]] Job 6:17 (of dried-up brooks).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. sf. [[חִמְּתַתְנִי]] Ps 119:139 [[קִנְאָתִי]] hath put an end to me (it is so intense).

definitions.title: Pi‘lēl
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. sf. [[חִמְּתֻתוּנִי]] (but rd. [[חִמְּתוּנִי]] Ges:§ 55 d, or [[חִמְּתָָתְנִי]]) Hi [Ges:§ 145k]; cf. Bae) Ps 88:17 thine alarms have annihilated me.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[הִחְמַתָּה]] Ps 73:27; Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יַחְמִיתֵם]] Ps 94:23, Ps 94:23; 2 ms. [[תַּחְמִית]] Ps 143:12, etc.; Imv. ms. sf. [[הַחְמִיתֵם]] Ps 54:7; Pt. pl. sf. [[מַחְמִיתַי]] Ps 69:5; —exterminate, annihilate, c. acc. pers., subj. Psalmist Ps 18:41 = 2Sa 22:41 (read as in Psalm), Ps 101:5, Ps 101:8; his foes Ps 69:5; ´[[י]] Ps 54:7, Ps 73:27, Ps 94:23, Ps 94:23, Ps 143:12.
